input.sentences: the day spent on the beach was amazing .
the kids all had fun on the edge of the water .
they even learned how to fish .
some of them even caught fish | though they were small .
at the end of the day | everyone had fun .
output.sentences: Dad is spending the day with his family at the beach fishing.
A child smiles for the camera near the water.
Another father is teaching a child how to fish.
The young girl catches a very small fish.
The kids relax after a fun day of fishing.
